named-query.name: Participant.getAll
named-query.query: from Participant p where not p.cancelled

named-query.name: Participant.getBySin
named-query.query: from Participant p where p.sin = :sin and not p.cancelled

named-query.name: User.getByUserName
named-query.query: from User u where u.username = :username and not u.cancelled

named-query.name: User.countByUserName
named-query.query: select count(u) from User u where u.username = :username and not u.cancelled
